text.div:
description :
Location the encounter takes place
NOTE: This US Core SearchParameter definition extends the usage context of the Conformance expectation extension
multipleAnd
multipleOr
comparator
modifier
chain
id us-core-encounter-location
url : http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/SearchParameter/us-core-encounter-location
version : 4.0.1
name : USCoreEncounterLocation
derivedFrom : http://hl7.org/fhir/SearchParameter/Encounter-location
status : active
date : 2021-11-08
publisher : HL7 International - US Realm Steering Committee
contact : http://www.hl7.org/Special/committees/usrealm/index.cfm
jurisdiction : United States of America (the) (Details : {urn:iso:std:iso:3166 code 'US' = 'United States of America', given as 'United States of America (the)'})
code : location
base :Encounter
type : reference
expression : Encounter.location.location
xpath : f:Encounter/f:location/f:location
xpathUsage : normal
mulitpleOr : True (Conformance Expectation = MAY)
mulitpleAnd : True ( Conformance Expectation = MAY)

description.value: **Location the encounter takes place** **NOTE**: This US Core SearchParameter definition extends the usage context of the [Conformance expectation extension](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extension-capabilitystatement-expectation.html) - multipleAnd - multipleOr - comparator - modifier - chain
